"Knowing the right answer ... is not one of the primary objectives of science in the early childhood curriculum..."
“Knowing the right answer requires no decisions, carries no risks, and makes no demands"

The Centre for Education in Science and Technology:
Importance of science in schools
"It is human to have a long childhood"
"it is civilized to have an even longer childhood." - Erik Erikson
Some studies have shown that investment in girls education raised the GDP of the entire country by 0.2%
Children of women who have completed primary school are 40% less likely to die before age five
An extra year of primary school boosts girls’ eventual wages by 10 to 20 percent. An extra year of secondary school: 15 to 25 percent
